body_html:
I believe we're now able to suggest building using bazel instead of CMake for Windows (email thread).

These instructions should be up soon, for a preview see:
https://gist.github.com/meteorcloudy/8e5f1aab7c7fa87b16ae28e6f8fd3fd2

Thus, I'm tempted to close this issue and defer to #19893 and #19583 instead.

Let me know if that doesn't make sense. Thanks!

These instructions should be up soon, for a preview see:

body:
I believe we're now able to suggest building using `bazel` instead of CMake for Windows ([email thread](https://groups.google.com/a/tensorflow.org/forum/#!topic/build/9vKi3ceP2ZI)).

These instructions should be up soon, for a preview see:
https://gist.github.com/meteorcloudy/8e5f1aab7c7fa87b16ae28e6f8fd3fd2

Thus, I'm tempted to close this issue and defer to #19893 and #19583 instead.

Let me know if that doesn't make sense. Thanks!
